attributes.action: increase the pay for nurses in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nurses are not getting enough money considering they do almost as much as doctors, but doctors and GPs get an extremely high pay.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nurses-pay/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
